p: Gucwa et al. [ 5] have recently reported the activity of EOs from Thymus vulgaris, Citrus limonum, Pelargonium graveolens, Cinnamomum cassia, Ocimum basilicum and Eugenia caryophyllus against 183 clinical isolates of C. albicans and 76 isolates of C. glabrata. The chemical composition and antifungal effects of the Eugenia uniflora EO were recently investigated against C. albicans, C. krusei and C. tropicalis standard strains [ 6].
